resources:
Fiesta
//Headings Event Organisation Academic Announcements Calendars & Timetables Pay Anywhere
//Description Our app is designed to simplify and streamline the event management process. Our app streamlines the process of making academic announcements. Updated academic calendars and schedules are available through our app. Using our app, it will be simple to pay for an event from anywhere.
Hello blank fragment We are excited to invite all the new students to our annual Freshers Party!This is the perfect opportunity to get to know your fellow classmates and start building new friendships that will last throughout your time at Watumull Institute.

Join us on 1 March at 6 p.m. in the ground of the campus. There will be plenty of delicious food, great music, and fun activities to help you unwind after your first few weeks of classes. So, grab your friends and come celebrate the start of your new academic journey with us! 

Make sure to RSVP by 27 Feb to secure your spot at the party. We cannot wait to see you there! 

#FreshersParty2023 #NewFriends #GoodVibesOnly #WatumullInstitute
